title: Inquisitor's plateskirt (beta)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Inquisitor's plateskirt are a piece of leg armour requiring 70 Strength and 30 Defence to equip, and is part of the Inquisitor's armour set. It is only available from the tournament supplies table in a tournament world as a test armour for players. It is one of the proposed rewards for Nightmare of Ashihama.

content:
Inquisitor's plateskirt (beta) is a temporary piece of content found only in unrestricted worlds.
The contents of this page refer to a piece of content only available on temporary unrestricted worlds as a means to test it before release.
Its design is subject to change, and the graphics are used as a placeholder.
Inquisitor's plateskirt
Released28 November 2019 (Update)
Removal11 December 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo

ExamineThe plateskirt of the turncloak Justiciar.

Advanced data
Item IDhist24421

The Inquisitor's plateskirt are a piece of leg armour requiring 70 Strength and 30 Defence to equip, and is part of the Inquisitor's armour set. It is only available from the tournament supplies table in a tournament world as a test armour for players. It is one of the proposed rewards for Nightmare of Ashihama.

Once belonging to "The Inquisitor", a former Saradominist Justiciar and one of the founders of Slepe, the Inquisitor's armour had remained sealed in the Sisterhood Sanctuary deep beneath Slepe until The Nightmare's arrival unearthed it.

 Attack bonuses
-3-3+12-9-5
 Defence bonuses
+42+30+49+0+22
 Other bonusesSlot
+2+0+0%+2List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 December 2019
(update)

The magic attack bonus has been reduced from +1 to -9.

[[File:Inquisitor's plateskirt (beta) detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''Inquisitor's plateskirt''' are a piece of leg armour requiring 70 [[Strength]] and 30 [[Defence]] to equip, and is part of the [[Inquisitor's armour]] set. It is only available from the tournament supplies table in a [[tournament world]] as a test armour for players. It is one of the proposed rewards for [[Nightmare of Ashihama]].

Once belonging to "The Inquisitor", a former [[Saradomin]]ist [[Justiciar]] and one of the founders of [[Slepe]], the Inquisitor's armour had remained sealed in the Sisterhood Sanctuary deep beneath Slepe until The Nightmare's arrival unearthed it.
